Plot: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.
Title: Before I Go to Sleep
Writer: Rowan Joffe, S.J. Watson (based on the novel by)
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Ben Crompton
tomatoConsensus: If it doesn't completely avoid thriller clichés, Before I Go to Sleep still offers a stylish, fast-paced, and well-acted diversion.
